speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Fear it not, sir: I would I were so sure

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To win the king as I am bold her honour

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Will remain hers.

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: What means do you make to him?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Not any, but abide the change of time,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Quake in the present winter's state and wish

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: That warmer days would come: in these sear'd hopes,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I barely gratify your love; they failing,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I must die much your debtor.

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Your very goodness and your company

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: O'erpays all I can do. By this, your king

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Hath heard of great Augustus: Caius Lucius

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Will do's commission throughly: and I think

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: He'll grant the tribute, send the arrearages,

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Or look upon our Romans, whose remembrance

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Is yet fresh in their grief.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I do believe,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Statist though I am none, nor like to be,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: That this will prove a war; and you shall hear

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The legions now in Gallia sooner landed

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: In our not-fearing Britain than have tidings

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Of any penny tribute paid. Our countrymen

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Are men more order'd than when Julius Caesar

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Smiled at their lack of skill, but found

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: their courage

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Worthy his frowning at: their discipline,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Now mingled with their courages, will make known

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To their approvers they are people such

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: That mend upon the world.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Enter IACHIMO

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: See! Iachimo!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The swiftest harts have posted you by land;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And winds of all the comers kiss'd your sails,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To make your vessel nimble.

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Welcome, sir.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I hope the briefness of your answer made

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The speediness of your return.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Your lady

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Is one of the fairest that I have look'd upon.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And therewithal the best; or let her beauty

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Look through a casement to allure false hearts

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And be false with them.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Here are letters for you.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Their tenor good, I trust.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: 'Tis very like.

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Was Caius Lucius in the Britain court

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: When you were there?

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: He was expected then,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: But not approach'd.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: All is well yet.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Sparkles this stone as it was wont? or is't not

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Too dull for your good wearing?

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: If I had lost it,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I should have lost the worth of it in gold.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I'll make a journey twice as far, to enjoy

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: A second night of such sweet shortness which

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Was mine in Britain, for the ring is won.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The stone's too hard to come by.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Not a whit,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Your lady being so easy.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Make not, sir,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Your loss your sport: I hope you know that we

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Must not continue friends.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Good sir, we must,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: If you keep covenant. Had I not brought

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: The knowledge of your mistress home, I grant

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: We were to question further: but I now

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Profess myself the winner of her honour,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Together with your ring; and not the wronger

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Of her or you, having proceeded but

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: By both your wills.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: If you can make't apparent

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: That you have tasted her in bed, my hand

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And ring is yours; if not, the foul opinion

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: You had of her pure honour gains or loses

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Your sword or mine, or masterless leaves both

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To who shall find them.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Sir, my circumstances,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Being so near the truth as I will make them,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Must first induce you to believe: whose strength

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I will confirm with oath; which, I doubt not,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: You'll give me leave to spare, when you shall find

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: You need it not.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Proceed.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: First, her bedchamber,--

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Where, I confess, I slept not, but profess

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Had that was well worth watching--it was hang'd

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: With tapesty of silk and silver; the story

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Proud Cleopatra, when she met her Roman,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: And Cydnus swell'd above the banks, or for

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: The press of boats or pride: a piece of work

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: So bravely done, so rich, that it did strive

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: In workmanship and value; which I wonder'd

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Could be so rarely and exactly wrought,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Since the true life on't was--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: This is true;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And this you might have heard of here, by me,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Or by some other.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: More particulars

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Must justify my knowledge.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: So they must,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Or do your honour injury.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: The chimney

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Is south the chamber, and the chimney-piece

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Chaste Dian bathing: never saw I figures

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: So likely to report themselves: the cutter

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Was as another nature, dumb; outwent her,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Motion and breath left out.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: This is a thing

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Which you might from relation likewise reap,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Being, as it is, much spoke of.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: The roof o' the chamber

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: With golden cherubins is fretted: her andirons--

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I had forgot them--were two winking Cupids

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Of silver, each on one foot standing, nicely

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Depending on their brands.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: This is her honour!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Let it be granted you have seen all this--and praise

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Be given to your remembrance--the description

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Of what is in her chamber nothing saves

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The wager you have laid.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Then, if you can,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Showing the bracelet

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Be pale: I beg but leave to air this jewel; see!

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: And now 'tis up again: it must be married

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: To that your diamond; I'll keep them.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Jove!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Once more let me behold it: is it that

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Which I left with her?

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Sir--I thank her--that:

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: She stripp'd it from her arm; I see her yet;

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Her pretty action did outsell her gift,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: And yet enrich'd it too: she gave it me, and said

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: She prized it once.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: May be she pluck'd it off

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To send it me.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: She writes so to you, doth she?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: O, no, no, no! 'tis true. Here, take this too;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Gives the ring

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: It is a basilisk unto mine eye,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Kills me to look on't. Let there be no honour

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Where there is beauty; truth, where semblance; love,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Where there's another man: the vows of women

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Of no more bondage be, to where they are made,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Than they are to their virtues; which is nothing.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: O, above measure false!

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Have patience, sir,

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: And take your ring again; 'tis not yet won:

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: It may be probable she lost it; or

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Who knows if one of her women, being corrupted,

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Hath stol'n it from her?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Very true;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And so, I hope, he came by't. Back my ring:

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Render to me some corporal sign about her,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: More evident than this; for this was stolen.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: By Jupiter, I had it from her arm.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Hark you, he swears; by Jupiter he swears.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: 'Tis true:--nay, keep the ring--'tis true: I am sure

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: She would not lose it: her attendants are

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: All sworn and honourable:--they induced to steal it!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And by a stranger!--No, he hath enjoyed her:

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The cognizance of her incontinency

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Is this: she hath bought the name of whore

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: thus dearly.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: There, take thy hire; and all the fiends of hell

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Divide themselves between you!

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Sir, be patient:

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: This is not strong enough to be believed

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Of one persuaded well of--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Never talk on't;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: She hath been colted by him.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: If you seek

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: For further satisfying, under her breast--

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Worthy the pressing--lies a mole, right proud

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Of that most delicate lodging: by my life,

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I kiss'd it; and it gave me present hunger

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: To feed again, though full. You do remember

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: This stain upon her?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Ay, and it doth confirm

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Another stain, as big as hell can hold,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Were there no more but it.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Will you hear more?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Spare your arithmetic: never count the turns;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Once, and a million!

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I'll be sworn--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: No swearing.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: If you will swear you have not done't, you lie;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And I will kill thee, if thou dost deny

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Thou'st made me cuckold.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: I'll deny nothing.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: O, that I had her here, to tear her limb-meal!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I will go there and do't, i' the court, before

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Her father. I'll do something--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Exit

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Quite besides

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: The government of patience! You have won:

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: Let's follow him, and pervert the present wrath

speaker: PHILARIO
text_entry: He hath against himself.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: With an my heart.

speaker: IACHIMO
text_entry: Exeunt
